title: TRICIL - Severed (FLAC)
description:
The remastered reissue of the blueprint of Peachtree Industrial, Severed. Expanded with tracks from the 2002-2005 era and mastered by Randy Garcia.

Originally a six-track EP released digitally in 2004, Severed represents an important chapter in the musical echelon of TRICIL. Newly remastered by the venerable Randy Garcia, this collection represents the pre-Esoteric Drift chapter of TRICIL.
